ModMetaData.name: ED-VisibleRadius
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description: Requires: ED-Core Adds the option to keep the special display radius visible when some buildings are not selected. Currently supports Sun Lamps, Trade Beacons will be enabled when they are working correctly. By default it will be on a timer to turn off after about 40 seconds, can be switched to permanently on or off.
